import React from 'react' import "./SignPage.css" import HeaderBottom from '../../HeaderBottom/HeaderBottom' import Button3 from '../../SiteButtons/Button3/Button3' import SiteHeadline from '../../SiteHeadline/SiteHeadline' import { Redirect } from 'react-router-dom' import Login from '../../Forms/Login/Login' import Register from '../../Forms/Register/Register' import { connect } from 'react-redux' const SignPage = (props) => { if (props.isAuth) { return } return ( <>
) } let mapStateToProps=(state)=>{ return{ isAuth:state.auth.isAuth, } } export default connect(mapStateToProps,null)(SignPage)
